name: Flip Tile - The Pattern Puzzle Game
name_original: Flip Tile - The Pattern Puzzle Game
description:
Flip Tile is a fun puzzle pattern game where you flip tiles over on a grid to make every tile the same color.

Simply touch a tile and and the entire row and column change color. Keep turning tiles until you crack the puzzle.

Of course as you progress the puzzles will change and we’ll add some new obstacles to keep things interesting!

Earn coins for clearing the grid in a perfect number of moves, unlock more challenging levels and see if you can solve them all.

To help accomplish this there are hints available to help you get a perfect score and there is also a DAILY PRIZE where you can earn coins to help you out.

Track your progress and see if you can get a perfect score on every level!

***Flip Tile Features***

100 LEVELS WITH DIFFERENT OBSTACLES!
Start small with the 3x3 grids and move through to the super challenging 6x6 grids to prove you are the puzzle master. Overcome challenging obstacles including:
- walls to block your progress
- mirrors to redirect your efforts
- diverts to send you in another direction
- warps which send you to another dimension!

CLEAN INTERFACE DESIGNED FOR IOS
- Simple and clean interface designed specifically for iOS.
- Bright and fresh colours to complement your iPhone.

HINTS
If you are blocked and can’t crack a grid, don't give up! Use one of the hints that each puzzles has to get you back on track!
